verses.name: 1 Kings 7:19
verses.text: And the chapiters that were upon the top of the pillars were of lily work in the porch, four cubits.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:20
verses.text: And the chapiters upon the two pillars had pomegranates also above, over against the belly which was by the network: and the pomegranates were two hundred in rows round about upon the other chapiter.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:21
verses.text: And he set up the pillars in the porch of the temple: and he set up the right pillar, and called the name thereof Jachin: and he set up the left pillar, and called the name thereof Boaz.
